channel.title: Private Server Client Hacking Tutorial List!
channel.description:
[center][size=17pt][b]Private Server Client Hacking Tutorial List![/b][/size] [/center] [center]
[b]This list will be Updated weekley[/b]
[u]Auto Cache Downloader - Easy to Use[/u] By: [b]openice123[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,385768.0.html
[hr] [u]Removing all word filtering and adding a word censor[/u] By: [b]Lin[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,369718.0.html
[hr] [u]Getting rid of loading bar[/u] By: [b]cocoa [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,384997.0.html [hr]
[u]Interface Editor, saves to cache file, only one clientside edit required[/u] By: [b]peterbjornx[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,382184.0.html [hr]
[u]RuneScape 2 Interface Maker -- Beta 2 Released! [Beta 2.1 Bugfix Available][/u] By: [b]Lin[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,380968.0.html [hr]
[u]Adding a Ring & Amulet Crafting Interface[/u] By: [b]Lin[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381915.0.html [hr]
[u]Non Renamed][Interface] Pest Control Reward Interface![/u] By: [b]Tonic[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,380962.0.html [hr]
[u][Non-Renamed] Adding a Assault Interface[/u] By: [b]Tonic[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,379583.0.html [hr]
[u]Runescapes New "Right Click" Context Menus My way with Correct Colors[/u] By: [b]Tonic[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381208.0.html [hr]
[u]How to add a theme tab to any client.[/u] By: [b]johno2 [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381573.0.html [hr]
[u]How to use the Interface Maker[/u] By: [b]Lin[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381702.0.html [hr]
[u] Replacing The Old Runescape Logo With The New Runescape Logo.(Explained W/ Pics)[/u] By: [b]Umah[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,376381.0.html [hr]
[u]Ric's Webclient tutorial, Last updated: 5/22/09[/u] By: [b]Ric914[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494.0.html [hr]
[u]New RuneScapes Hp bars [Non-Renamed][/u] By: [b]Tonic[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381421.0.html [hr]
[u]ALMOST Full 100% current RuneScape Varrock Fountain[/u] By: [b]Oxygenn[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,377268.0.html [hr]
[u]Adding teleport almost like on RS[/u] By: [b]Mitko[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,375601.0.html [hr]
[u][non renamed] add clickable text [for interfaces][/u] By: [b]Hexyl[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,380017.0.html [hr]
[u]Project Tobex - Free Web Clients for everyone! [RELEASED][/u] By: [b]tobias222 [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367146.0.html [hr]
[u]Using Jagex's Stream class to create files.[/u] By: [b]SonGoku[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,380233.0.html [hr]
[u]Communicating with Java using JavaScript[/u] By: [b]tobias222 [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,380540.0.html [hr]
[u]How to correctly add custom crowns[/u] By: [b]GalkonsPride[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,265260.0.html [hr]
[u]Loading Custom Crowns for NEW Player Rights[/u] By: [b]Stewie_ [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363788.0.html [hr]
[u]Making a Godwars Killcount interface [NON] renamed[/u] By: [b]Berky-Scape[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,376716.0.html [hr]
[u]How to add objects to your client.[/u] By: [b]Tatemo [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,374098.0.html [hr]
[u]Masking Skills Completely (Icon & Text) By Cache Editing![/u] By: [b]Lin[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367142.0.html [hr]
[u][508] Adding custom items![/u] By: [b]bloodisle[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,356459.0.html [hr]
[u]Runescape Cache Modifier/Repacker[/u] By: [b]AuraDevil [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,357423.0.html [hr]
[u]Two worlds - F2p and P2p - Members items[/u] By: [b]warlock 999 [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,369611.0.html [hr]
[u]Hiding Batch files from Task Bar[/u] By: [b]_ikram[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,370333.0.html [hr]
[u]Adding custom loginbox + buttons for Project Fubergen Clients[/u] By: [b]Sir roju [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,332018.0.html [hr]
[u]Hiding Your Client Folder And Command Prompt || Run At Desktop! (With Pics)[/u] By: [b]Xx Mott xX [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,368815.0.html [hr]
[u]Map Editor Source - Fixed.[/u] By: [b]x blitz x [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336173.0.html [hr]
[u]Crowns, Admin/Owner/Donator/Mod Icons for your client.[/u] By: [b]Mitko [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363702.0.html [hr]
[u]Making Everything Lava (Water, Buildings,walls, Trees!)[/u] By: [b]FireClan[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,351238.0.html [hr]
[u]Custom Censor[/u] By: [b]SonGoku[/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364550.0.html [hr]
[u][Refactored]8 lined chatbox[/u] By: [b]Stewie_ [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363787.0.html [hr]
[u]Exact 508+ Gameframe[/u] By: [b]AKA Carlos [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363713.0.html [hr]
[u][508] How to recolor items[/u] By: [b]dragmagic [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,357482.0.html [hr]
[u]How To Add Real GodSwords[/u] By: [b]vaiosony [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,274131.0.html [hr]
[u] [508] adding custom gfx[/u] By: [b]bloodisle [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,356463.0.html [hr]
[u]Making interface with custom images - [UPDATED][/u] By: [b]supra s [/b] Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,332434.0.html [hr]
[b]I take No credit's i only made the long list, if you have an issue with one of the above tut's dont tell me, it's just here to make your lifes easy.[/b]
[/center]

item.title: Private Server Client Hacking Tutorial List!
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

[quote=“HAIHAIHAI, post:11, topic:288966”]if(UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing){
if(GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 8) == false){
sM(“You are too far to range your enemy!”);
ResetAttack();
return false;
}
}

this is my coding for following with range and it doesn’t seem to work, any ideas what’s wrong with it?

Thanks![/quote]

Post this in the “Server Help” section please.

Read full topic

return false;
}
}

this is my coding for following with range and it doesn’t seem to work, any ideas what’s wrong with it?

Thanks!

Yeh, the layout may be confusing but wont mean i wont update it, i may show some indication of update’s so you guys can see, maybe put an Image representing if the topic is new or old.
